Poll Worker Roles

There are three main roles you can serve in to help ensure election integrity. Each role has different responsibilities and requirements.

Election Judge

Election judges oversee the entire polling location, ensure procedures are followed correctly, and manage the team of election workers. This is the most responsible role and requires training from the Board of Elections.

Learn More

Poll Watcher

Poll watchers observe the voting process to ensure fairness and compliance with election laws. They can be present at polling places and report any irregularities to the proper authorities.

Get Involved

Challenger

Challengers have the authority to question the eligibility of voters at the polls. This role requires official certification and must follow strict legal procedures to protect voter rights.

Get Certified
